dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.resource.res.log.tip.nrf.TIPConnectionTerminationPoint
dataStructure.description:
This object class is an actual or potential end point of a Subnetwork Connection or Flow Domain Fragment. For example, the ConnectionTerminationPoint (CTP) can represent a logical channel or a timeslot on a physical link. Note regarding naming: Wherever multiple layers are applicable to a particular CTP, the connectable layer is used as a basis for the name. When the CTP has no connectable layer, any layer that ensures name unicity can be used. See R_TMF518_NRF_I_0009 and R_TMF518_NRF_I_0010. For Flow Points in connectionless networks see R_TMF518_NRF_I_0018.

This entity is optional

This entity is extendable

This entity does not generate Object Creation notifications

This entity does not generate Object Deletion notifications

This entity does not generate Object Discovery notifications

This entity generates Attribute Value Change notifications.
dataStructure.label: TIPConnectionTerminationPoint

child.name: tpMappingMode
child.description:
Within the facade definition, the CTP/FTP can act as an aggregate of associated G.805 TCPs, G.805 Termination Functions and G.805 CPs at one or more LayerRates. The CTP is contained within a PTP or FTP. The tpMappingMode attribute indicates and controls the connection of the named CP at a specified LayerRate to the dedicated G.805 TCP and associated G.805 Termination Function at the same LayerRate within the CTP/FTP.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional

This attribute is AVC enabled
child.label: tpMappingMode

child.name: connectionState
child.description:
The values that this attribute may take are constrained by the value of the "direction" attribute of the CTP. There is also a dependency on the value of the "tpMappingMode" attribute of the CTP. See R_TMF518_NRF_I_0037.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional

This attribute is AVC enabled
child.label: connectionState

child.name: connectionTerminationPoint1
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..1

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association Protects

This association end is optional
child.label: connectionTerminationPoint1
